headline: Ask HN: What Is the Purpose of Publishing a Nonsense CG Article?
description:
A "recent news" article referencing the defunct "Sports Authority" caught my attention today. The entire text appears to be computer generated nonsense. Is there a business case for publishing this?

Article for reference: https://medium.com/@f3eulca622/15-reasons-why-you-shouldnt-ignore-baltimore-ravens-super-bowl-apparel-at-sports-authority-cheap-2b1a1166dc60
headline_zh-Hans: Ask HN: 发表无稽之谈的CG文章的目的是什么？
headline_zh-Hant: Ask HN: 發表無稽之談的CG文章的目的是什麼？
description_zh-Hans:
今天，一篇提到已停业的 "体育局 "的"最近的新闻"文章引起我的注意。整个文本似乎是计算机生成的废话。发表这篇文章有什么商业价值吗？

文章供参考。 https://medium.com/@f3eulca622/15-reasons-why you-shouldnt-ignore-baltimore-ravens-super-bowl-apparel-at-sports-authority-cheap-2b1a1166dc60
description_zh-Hant:
今天，一篇提到已停業的 "體育局 "的"最近的新聞"文章引起我的注意。整個文本似乎是計算機生成的廢話。發表這篇文章有什麼商業價值嗎？

文章供參考。 https://medium.com/@f3eulca622/15-reasons-why you-shouldnt-ignore-baltimore-ravens-super-bowl-apparel-at-sports-authority-cheap-2b1a1166dc60
